entries.label: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
Ministry Of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
Ministry of Fisheries,Animal Husbandry and Dairying
Ministry Of New and Renewable Energy
Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
Ministry of Women and Child Development
Ministry Of Skill Development And Entrepreneurship
Ministry Of Personnel, Public Grievances And Pensions
Ministry Of Petroleum and Natural Gas
Comptroller And Auditor General Of India
Ministry Of Environment,forests and climate change
Ministry Of Consumer Affairs, Food And Public Distribution
Ministry Of Development Of North Eastern Region
Ministry Of Statistics and Programme Implementation
NITI Aayog (National Institution for Transforming India)

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Consumer Affairs, Food And Public Distribution
fields.schemeName: One Nation One Ration Card
fields.briefDescription: "One Nation, One Ration Card" is Aadhaar-based national ration card portability scheme to ensure food security for all, including internal migrants within India, under which beneficiaries can purchase subsidized food anywhere in India.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: National Award For Senior Citizens (vayoshreshtha Samman): Best Institution For Research In The Field Of Ageing
fields.briefDescription: The "Vayoshreshtha Samman: Best Institution for Research in the Field of Ageing" award shall be given to institutions with a record of outstanding work in research and dissemination of knowledge in the field of ageing. The awards are conferred on 1st Oct every year by the Hon’ble President of India.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: National Award For Senior Citizens (vayoshreshtha Samman): Courage & Bravery
fields.briefDescription: The "Vayoshreshtha Samman: Courage & Bravery" award shall be given to senior citizens who have displayed extraordinary courage in the face of grave danger. The awards are conferred on 1st October every year by the Hon’ble President of India at Vigyan Bhawan, New Delhi.

fields.schemeName: The Andaman & Nicobar Islands Disability Allowance Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to provide financial assistance to the differently able unemployed persons with 40% disability or more in the Andaman and Nicobar Islands.

fields.schemeName: "Conducting of Exhibitions" Component of the "Development of Coir" Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Conducting of Exhibitions" aims to enhance awareness of diverse coir products and promote their market presence. It extends financial support, including a daily allowance of ₹150 per participant and travel reimbursements, to both local and outstation participants.

fields.schemeName: Disability Assistance (ANBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme provides financial assistance to registered construction workers who become disabled due to an accident during the course of their employment on the production of a certificate from competent medical authorities in respect of the percentage of disability.

fields.schemeName: Marriage Benefit (MBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: Under the scheme, financial assistance shall be provided to registered construction workers for their own marriage. This assistance shall also be sanctioned for the marriage of all adult children of a worker subject to production of proper documentation such as Marriage Certificates etc.

fields.schemeName: Differently Abled Pension Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The 'Differently Abled Pension Scheme' aims to provide a pension of ₹1,000/- to differently-abled persons with disability level 40% and above. The scheme provides other benefits every year during the Pongal and Deepavali festival saree, dhoti and a nutritious meal is supplied through Anganwadi.

fields.schemeName: Natural Death Benefit Scheme (PBAOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: The "Natural Death Benefit Scheme" is a Welfare Scheme by the Puducherry Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Department, Union Territory of Puducherry. Through this scheme, financial assistance of ₹70,000/- is extended to the nominees/dependents of the deceased.

fields.schemeName: "Advance/High Skill Training in Coir" Component of the "Development of Coir" Scheme
fields.briefDescription: "Advance/High Skill Training in Coir" aims to enhance the skills of Coir artisans and interested individuals. The objective is to acquire the latest skills and modern technologies through advanced/high-skilled training available across various locations in India, offering valuable benefits.

fields.schemeName: Destitute/Deserted Wives Pension Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The 'Destitute/Deserted Wives Pension Scheme' is a state scheme to give a pension of ₹1,000/- to the destitute/deserted wives. The scheme provides other benefit every year during the Pongal and Deepavali festival one priceless saree is given.

fields.schemeName: Cycle Anudaan Yojana
fields.briefDescription: A labor department initiated a scheme "Cycle Anudan Yojana' in 2018 for the construction worker of Madhya Pradesh and provide them financial assistance for cycle.

fields.schemeName: National Technology Awards
fields.briefDescription: The National Technology Awards refer to an event or program that recognizes and celebrates technological innovation and excellence across various industries within a particular country.

fields.schemeName: Disablement Benefit Scheme (PBAOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: Through this scheme, financial assistance of ₹75,000/- is extended based on the Disablement Certificate issued by the Competent Authority to the Registered Construction Worker of the Board. The amount is credited through Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT) into the bank account of the worker.

fields.schemeName: "Capital Investment Subsidy: SC/ST/Women Entrepreneurs" Component of the "Motivation of Entrepreneurs to Start Industries and Fiscal Assistance to Industries" Scheme
fields.briefDescription: "Capital Investment Subsidy: SC/ST/Women Entrepreneurs" is a scheme by the Department of Industrial Development (Industries and Commerce), Union Territory of Puducherry. The department extends subsidies for the investments made on land, buildings, plants & machinery @ 25%.

fields.schemeName: Total Health Check-up Scheme (GBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: This scheme facilitates a complete physical examination of the construction workers, which can diagnose potential illnesses and early treatment can prevent major illnesses. Hence, major illness can be avoided and the construction worker can lead a healthy life.

fields.schemeName: Loans for Tools (MBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: Under the scheme, a one-time grant will be granted to all members of the fund for the purchase of tools subject to the conditions.

fields.schemeName: Pension Plan (MBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: Under the scheme, a member of the fund who has been working as a building worker for not less than one year after the commencement of these rules shall on completion of sixty years of age be eligible for the person.

fields.schemeName: Dr. Muthulakshmi Reddy Ninaivu Inter-caste Marriage Assistance Scheme-I
fields.briefDescription: The 'Dr. Muthulakshmi Reddy Ninaivu Inter-caste Marriage Assistance Scheme' was launched by the Social Welfare & Women Empowerment Dept. Tamil Nadu. The aim is to abolish caste & community discrimination by encouraging inter-caste marriage by giving financial assistance to newly married couples.

fields.schemeName: Skill Development Scheme (PBAOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: The Board is implementing this scheme by entering an MoU with M/s Labour Net Services Private Limited and M/s G&G Skill Developers Private Limited, to provide training to the Construction Workers enrolled as beneficiaries in the Board. The applications are accepted offline.

fields.schemeName: Kushal Shramik Sahay Yojana (GBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: Under the scheme, assistance shall be provided to registered construction workers and their children for career development. By advancing in skill education, the children of construction workers can also progress and avail employment opportunities.

fields.schemeName: Government Service Home - Tamil Nadu
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Government Service Home" was launched by the Social Welfare and Women Empowerment Department, Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to provide institutional care to widows, destitute women, deserted women, adolescent girls and differently-abled women and their children.

fields.schemeName: Integrated Farming in Micro Watershed Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to promote integrated farming activities for improved livelihood in a complementary manner.

fields.schemeName: Scheme of Giving Awards to Eminent Artists - Kalai Nanmani Award
fields.briefDescription: "Scheme of Giving Awards to Eminent Artists - Kalai Nanmani Award" by the Art and Culture Department, Government of Tamil Nadu aims to promote and preserve the culture of Tamil Nadu. The selected artists are awarded financial assistance ₹15,000/- and certificates of appreciation.

fields.schemeName: Farm Pond (Khet Talai) Nirman Karyakram
fields.briefDescription: Under the Farm Pond (Khet Talaee) Nirmaan Kaaryakram scheme provied to help the farmers of Rajasthan to collect rain water and use it for irrigation purposes so that the farmers can get sufficient water for irrigation in their fields.

fields.schemeName: Sinchai Pipeline Karyakram
fields.briefDescription: In "Sinchai Pipeline Karyakram" Rajasthan government will provide subsidies to farmers on purchasing irrigation pipelines. So that farmers can get rid of the problem of irrigation. And their income can increase.

fields.schemeName: Funeral Assistance Scheme (PULWS)
fields.briefDescription: The "Funeral Assistance Scheme (PULWS)" is a Welfare Scheme by the Puducherry Unorganised Labourers' Welfare Society. The Society extends ₹7,000/- to the nominee of the deceased Unorganised Worker towards meeting the funeral expenses. The amount is credited through DBT into the bank account.

fields.schemeName: Gharelu Hinsa Ki Pidita Ke Liye Sahayta Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The Madhya Pradesh State Government started "Gharelu Hinsa Peedit Ke Liye Sahayta" Yojana for victims of domestic violence in Madhya Pradesh, offering various types of assistance including financial aid, legal support, and shelter.

fields.schemeName: Hostel Assistance Scheme for Children of Migrant Construction Workers (GBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: Under the scheme, hostel facilities for free accommodation and meals shall be provided to the children of migrant construction workers in primary school. The aim of the scheme is to provide primary, secondary, and higher education to the children of migrant construction workers.

fields.schemeName: "Generator Subsidy" under "Motivation of Entrepreneurs to Start Industries and Fiscal Assistance to Industries"
fields.briefDescription: Through this scheme, the micro, small and medium industrial units (manufacturing and service sector) shall be eligible for the grant of 50% subsidy with a cap of ₹5,00,000/- per industrial unit on the investment made on or after 5-3-2009 on generator sets. The applications are accepted offline.

fields.schemeName: Dhanvantari Arogya Rath Yojana (GBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme has been implemented to ensure that construction workers and their families get primary medical treatment at their doorsteps, prevent serious diseases and maintain their health at places including construction sites, labour colonies and Kadianaka.

fields.schemeName: Scheme to Award Scholarship to Young Artists
fields.briefDescription: The "Scheme to Award Scholarship to Young Artists" was launched by the Art and Culture Department, Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to encourage the postgraduate and graduate students of the Government College of Fine Arts, Chennai & Kumbakonam by awarding scholarships every year.

fields.schemeName: Free Studentship
fields.briefDescription: The "Free Studentship" initiative, administered by the Directorate of Higher & Technical Education, Meghalaya, is a state-sponsored program aimed at providing financial assistance to students belonging to the SC/ST/OBC categories for their tuition fees and other fee according to prescribed rates.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Sports Development Scheme - Retired Person
fields.briefDescription: Launched on 9th February 2024 the "Mukhyamantri Sports Development Scheme-Retired Person" was launched by the Directorate of Youth Affairs & Sports, Govt. of Tripura. The scheme aims to generate employment opportunities for retired persons by giving a monthly fixed remuneration of ₹30,000/-.

fields.schemeName: Scheme of Giving Awards to Eminent Artists - Kalai Mudhumani Award
fields.briefDescription: "Scheme of Giving Awards to Eminent Artists - Kalai Mudhumani Award" by the Art and Culture Department, Government of Tamil Nadu aims to promote and preserve the culture of Tamil Nadu. The selected artists are awarded financial assistance ₹20,000/- and certificates of appreciation.

fields.schemeName: National Water Awards
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the National Water Awards is to encourage the stakeholders to adopt a holistic approach toward water resource management in the country as surface water and groundwater play a signiﬁcant role in the water cycle.

fields.schemeName: National Handicrafts Development Programme: Direct Benefit to Artisans - Supports to Artisans in Indigent Circumstances
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Direct Benefit to Artisans - Supports to Artisans in Indigent Circumstances" is designed to give a boost to the handicraft sector in India. Assistance of upto ₹8,000/- per month is granted to the Artisans in Indigent Circumstances in the form of monthly allowance/lump sum grant/ both.

fields.schemeName: "Innovation in Technology [Product (or) Process]" under “Motivation of Entrepreneurs to Start Industries and Fiscal Assistance to Industries - State Awards to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises”
fields.briefDescription: The award "Innovation in Technology [Product (or) Process]" under “Motivation of Entrepreneurs to Start Industries and Fiscal Assistance to Industries - State Awards to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises” is conferred upon the industrial units who have patented their technology innovation.

fields.schemeName: "Capital Investment Subsidy (for New and Existing Industries)" under "Motivation of Entrepreneurs to Start Industries and Fiscal Assistance to Capital Intensive Industries"
fields.briefDescription: Through "Capital Investment Subsidy (for New and Existing Industries)", the enterprises & entrepreneurs are provided subsidies of upto 45% on the investments made on land, buildings, plants and machinery. The applications are accepted offline in the prescribed form available on the Official website.

fields.schemeName: "Interest Subsidy (For Micro, Small, Medium and Large New Industries)" under "Motivation of Entrepreneurs to Start Industries and Fiscal Assistance to Industries - Various Incentives"
fields.briefDescription: Through this scheme, the industrial units availing loans from financial institutions towards the creation of fixed assets and for working capital shall be eligible for an interest subsidy to an extent of 25% of the annual interest amount paid. The applications are accepted offline.

fields.schemeName: Scheme of Grant-In-Aid for Conduct of Art Exhibitions: One-Man Shows
fields.briefDescription: "Scheme of Grant-In-Aid for Conduct of Art Exhibitions: One-Man Shows" was launched by the Art and Culture Department, Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to encourage talented artists in the field of painting, and sculpture by granting ₹25,000/- for conducting "one-man show" art exhibitions.

fields.schemeName: "Assistance for Technology Acquisition" under "Motivation of Entrepreneurs to Start Industries and Fiscal Assistance to Capital Intensive Industries"
fields.briefDescription: Through "Assistance for Technology Acquisition", assistance for acquisition of appropriate technology in any form for specific product/process is provided by way of 50% grant subject to a maximum of ₹10,00,000/-. The applications are accepted offline in the prescribed form available.

fields.schemeName: Scheme of Financial Assistance to Indigent Artists
fields.briefDescription: The "Scheme of Financial Assistance to Indigent Artists" was launched by the Art and Culture Department, Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to provide financial assistance of ₹3,000/- to indigent artists are now in indigent circumstances and their dependents.

fields.schemeName: Tablet Assistance to Scheduled Caste Students of 12th Standard
fields.briefDescription: Under the scheme, students in the 12th standard belonging to the Scheduled Caste category will receive a tablet by paying a token fee of ₹1,000/-.

fields.schemeName: Green House
fields.briefDescription: Under the Green House Scheme Farmers can get the benefit of subsidy on green house and earn more income by cultivating horticultural crops like vegetables, flowers, fruits etc. by controlling the ago-climatic factors, temperature, humidity and sunlight.

fields.schemeName: Food Bill Assistance to SC Students
fields.briefDescription: The food bill assistance at the rate of ₹1,500/- per month (Up to 10 Months) will be granted to the Scheduled Caste (SC) students admitted in college-affiliated hostels.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance to SC Students Studying in Medical, Engineering and Diploma Course for Purchasing Educational Instrument
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme ₹10,000/- for Medical students, ₹8,000/- for Engineering students and ₹3,000/- Diploma students granted for purchase of study instrument to the Scheduled Caste students studying in Medical, Engineering, Diploma courses.

fields.schemeName: Scheme of Giving Awards to Eminent Artists - Kalai Valarmani Award
fields.briefDescription: "Scheme of Giving Awards to Eminent Artists - Kalai Valarmani Award" by the Art and Culture Department, Government of Tamil Nadu aims to promote and preserve the culture of Tamil Nadu. The selected artists are awarded financial assistance ₹6,000/- and certificates of appreciation.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Mahila Poshan Yojana
fields.briefDescription: “Mukhyamantri Mahila Poshan Yojana” is a social security scheme by the Department of Women Empowerment and Child Development, Government of Uttarakhand, that aims to reduce malnutrition among the pregnant/lactating women of the state through providing nutritional food.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Mahalaxmi Kit Yojana
fields.briefDescription: “Mukhyamantri Mahalaxmi Kit Yojana” is a social security scheme by the Department of Women Empowerment and Child Development, Government of Uttarakhand, that aims to provide nutritional kits to the postpartum mothers and their daughters.

fields.schemeName: Scheme of Extending Financial Assistance to New Drama Productions
fields.briefDescription: "Scheme of Extending Financial Assistance to New Drama Productions" aims to encourage the dance-drama art forms and the artists involved in such arts. The scheme provides grants of ₹20,000/- for the production and staging of new Tamil dance dramas based on Tamil arts, literature and culture.

fields.schemeName: Sanitary Napkin Scheme
fields.briefDescription: “Sanitary Napkin Scheme” is a social security scheme by the Department of Women Empowerment and Child Development, Government of Uttarakhand, that aims to distribute sanitary napkins to adolescent girls/women.

fields.schemeName: Kam Lagat Pyaaj Bhandaran Sanrachna
fields.briefDescription: Under the Kam Lagat Pyaaj Bhandaran Sanrachna yojana Construction of warehouses should be done at a high level to prevent moisture and dampness which occur due to direct contact of onions with soil.

fields.schemeName: Drip Sanyantr
fields.briefDescription: Under the Drip Sanyantr scheme, the government gives subsidies to farmers. There is an immense saving of water in this method. Under this method, water is applied drop by drop to the roots of the plants and wastage of water will negligible.

fields.schemeName: Special Scholarship to SC Students in Selected Schools
fields.briefDescription: The scheme provides financial assistance to SC students studying in famous private selected schools i.e. Doon School, Dehradun; Sofiya School, Abu; Mayo school, Ajmer; Sainik School, Balachadi; Mahila Sainik School, Kherva; Dist. Mehsana, etc. will be paid actual fees upto limit of ₹50,000/- p.a.

fields.schemeName: Dr. P. G. Solanki Scheme for Loan/Assistance to Medical Graduate Doctors of Scheduled Caste
fields.briefDescription: The scheme was launched in the year 1976 with the objective to provide loans/assistance to the Scheduled Caste category doctors to start their independent profession.

fields.schemeName: Loan Assistance to Scheduled Castes Students for Commercial Pilot Training
fields.briefDescription: The scheme was commenced in the year 1987 with the objective to provide financial assistance to bright Scheduled Castes Students who want to undergo training for commercial pilot license.

fields.schemeName: Festival Gift Coupons (Sainik Welfare)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Festival Gift Coupons" is a Welfare Scheme by the Armed Forces Flag Day Fund of the Department of Sainik Welfare, Puducherry. The objective of the scheme is to provide Festival Gift Coupons worth ₹4,000/- per annum to the Non-Pensioner ESMs who are 60 years or older in age.

fields.schemeName: Spectacle Grant (Sainik Welfare)
fields.briefDescription: "Spectacle Grant" is a Welfare Scheme by the Armed Forces Flag Day Fund of the Dept of Sainik Welfare, Puducherry. Through this scheme, ₹2,000/- to the Ex-servicemen/Widows of Ex-servicemen for the purchase of Spectacle. The members of the Ex-Servicemen Contributory Health Scheme are not eligible.

fields.schemeName: Cash Grant in lieu of Sewing Machine
fields.briefDescription: "Cash Grant in lieu of Sewing Machine" is a Welfare Scheme by the Armed Forces Flag Day Fund of the Dept of Sainik Welfare, Puducherry. Through this scheme, ₹10,000/- is provided to the Widows of Ex-servicemen for the purchase of a Sewing Machine. The applications are accepted offline.

fields.schemeName: Anganwadi Workers Welfare Fund
fields.briefDescription: “Anganwadi Workers Welfare Fund” is a social security scheme by the Department of Women Empowerment and Child Development, Government of Uttarakhand, that provides financial assistance to the anganwadi worker/helper of the state.

fields.schemeName: Sympathetic Assistance and Handholding for Youth Transformation and Amelioration - SAHAYTA
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Sympathetic Assistance And Handholding For Youth Transformation And Amelioration" is a Jammu and Kashmir initiative with the aim of financial assistance.

fields.schemeName: Fodder Minikits under Integrated Fodder Development Scheme (General Category)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Fodder Minikits under Integrated Fodder Development Scheme” is implemented by the Directorate of Animal Husbandry, Government of Gujarat to provide an improved variety of fodder seeds to beneficiaries for widespread publicity, demonstration, and adaptation by farmers.

fields.schemeName: Dr. Savitaben Ambedkar Inter Caste Marriage Assistance Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The scheme has been implemented as part of social empowerment by addressing inequality through marriages between individuals from Scheduled Castes of Hinduism and those from castes other than Scheduled Castes of Hinduism.

fields.schemeName: Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Shramik Pravidhik Shiksha Sahaayata Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The Government of Uttar Pradesh initiated a scheme "Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Shramik Pravidhik Shiksha Sahaayata Yojana" to encourage the children towards the education.

fields.schemeName: Indira Gandhi National Vrdhavastha Pension Yojana
fields.briefDescription: In this scheme, pension is payable to persons below from BPL category families listed as per the norms of the Government of India.

fields.schemeName: Chetan Chauhan Labor Sports Promotion Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The Chetan Chauhan Shramik Krida Protsahan Yojana (CCSKPY) is a scheme launched by the Uttar Pradesh government in 2022 to provide financial assistance to the children of construction workers for participating in sports

fields.schemeName: Indira Mahila Shakti Prashikshan Evam Koshal Sanvardhan Yojana (RS-CSEP)
fields.briefDescription: The Indira Mahila Shakti Prashikshan Evam Koshal Sanvardhan Yojana, offered by the Rajasthan Knowledge Corporation Limited (RKCL), provides free training in spoken English and personality development for women and girls.

fields.schemeName: Indira Gandhi National Vidhva Pension yojana
fields.briefDescription: In the Indira Gandhi National Vidhva Pension Yojana (IGNWPS), financial support is provided to the widows of the state of Rajasthan.

fields.schemeName: Assistance for Tools, Equipment, Shorting/Grading Equipment, PHM Equipment for Scheduled Castes (HRT-4)
fields.briefDescription: Under the scheme, financial assistance is provided to farmers belonging to the Scheduled Castes category as well as to farmer groups and cooperative societies for purchasing various tools, equipment, sorting/grading equipment, and Post-Harvest Management (PHM) equipment.

fields.schemeName: Harvesting Tools Assistance for Scheduled Tribes (HRT-3)
fields.briefDescription: Under the scheme, financial assistance is provided to farmers belonging to the ST category as well as to FPOs (Farmers Producer Organizations), FPCs (Farmers Producer Companies), FIGs (Farmer Interest Groups), SHGs (Self-Help Groups), and Cooperative Societies for purchasing harvesting tools.

fields.schemeName: Harvesting Tools Assistance for Scheduled Castes (HRT-4)
fields.briefDescription: Under the scheme, financial assistance is provided to farmers belonging to the SC category as well as to FPOs (Farmers Producer Organizations), FPCs (Farmers Producer Companies), FIGs (Farmer Interest Groups), SHGs (Self-Help Groups), and Cooperative Societies for purchasing harvesting tools.

fields.schemeName: Grant of Financial Assistance for Purchase of Textbooks/Notebooks to School-Going Children of Industrial Workers/Employees (GLWB)
fields.briefDescription: Through this scheme, the children of industrial workers/employees, studying in classes 1st to 4th in recognized/approved schools are provided financial assistance for the purchase of textbooks/notebooks. The scheme aims to provide financial support for the educational needs of the children.

fields.schemeName: Funeral Assistance (GBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: "Funeral Assistance (GBOCWWB)" is a Welfare Scheme by the Goa Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board of the Department of Labour and Employment, Government of Goa. Through this scheme, the nominee/dependant of the deceased worker is provided with financial assistance of ₹5,000/-.

fields.schemeName: Family Pension (GBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: "Family Pension (GBOCWWB)" is a Welfare Scheme by the Goa Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board of the Dept of Labour and Employment, Goa. Through this scheme, in the event of the death of the pensioner of the Board, a 50% pension or ₹200, whichever is higher, is given to the spouse.

fields.schemeName: Death Benefit (GBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: Through the "Death Benefit" scheme, the nominee/dependant of the deceased worker is provided with financial assistance. The death should have either been natural or caused due to an accident, during the course of employment. The applications are accepted offline.

fields.schemeName: General Pre Matric Scholarship-Uttar Pradesh
fields.briefDescription: The Uttar Pradesh Social Welfare Department offers a Pre Matric Scholarship for General category students. This scholarship aims to financially assist students from these categories to pursue secondary education and complete their matriculation.

fields.schemeName: Maintenance Allowance for Persons Affected with Muscular Dystrophy
fields.briefDescription: The 'Maintenance Allowance for Persons Affected with Muscular Dystrophy' scheme was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to provide a maintenance allowance to the person affected with muscular dystrophy.

fields.schemeName: Scheme for Providing Financial Assistance for the Purchase of Laptop or Desktop Computer to the Media Persons of the Union Territory of Puducherry
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to grant financial assistance for the purchase of laptops or desktop computers to eligible media persons, keeping in view the special nature of the service rendered by the Media Persons to society in creating a sense of socio-political awareness among the people.

fields.schemeName: Dr. Ambedkar Awas Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Under the scheme, financial assistance of ₹1,20,000/- is provided to Scheduled Caste individuals who do not own a residential home, have an old rough residential home, or own a plot for residence, and who belong to the Below Poverty Line (BPL) category for the construction of a house.

fields.schemeName: Post Graduate Scholarship for GATE/GPAT Qualified Students for Pursuing M.Tech/M.E./M.Pharm-UGC
fields.briefDescription: University Grants Commission is implementing the scheme of Post Graduate Scholarship for GATE/GPAT Qualified Students for Pursuing M.Tech/M.E./M.Pharm courses (including integrated dual degree courses).

fields.schemeName: Grant to Meritorious Wards of Ex-Servicemen in Academics (Lump Sum Grant)
fields.briefDescription: Through this scheme, the academically meritorious wards of the ESM / Widows of ESM who have secured the top three ranks in academics are provided with lump sum grants of upto ₹18,000. The application should be submitted within three months from the date of publication of the result.

fields.schemeName: Readers Allowance to Visually Impaired Persons
fields.briefDescription: 'Readers Allowance to Visually Impaired Persons' scheme was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Government of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to provide readers allowance to visually impaired students, specific allowance rates based on the education level.

fields.schemeName: Purchase/Construction of House for the Construction Workers
fields.briefDescription: The "Purchase/Construction of House for the Construction Workers" by the Delhi Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board is a welfare scheme for its registered workers. An advance amount of ₹3,00,000/- to ₹5,00,000/- is provided for the purchase/construction of a house.

fields.schemeName: Disability Pension for the Construction Workers
fields.briefDescription: The "Disability Pension for the Construction Workers" by the Delhi Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Department, Delhi, is a welfare scheme that provides monthly disability pension of ₹3000/- to the permanently disabled member due to paralysis, leprosy, T.B and accidents.

fields.schemeName: Reimbursement of Tuition Fees to the Wards of Ex-Servicemen/Widows (Sainik Welfare)
fields.briefDescription: "Reimbursement of Tuition Fees to the Wards of Ex-Servicemen/Widows (Sainik Welfare)" is a Welfare Scheme by the Dept of Sainik Welfare, Puducherry. The wards of the ESM / Widows of ESM studying in Government-recognized Institutions are provided reimbursement of their tuition fees.

fields.schemeName: Ex-gratia Payment for the Construction Workers
fields.briefDescription: The "Ex-gratia Payment for the Construction Workers" by the Delhi Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Department, Delhi, is a welfare scheme for the registered workers of the board that provides an ex-gratia amount of ₹1,00,000/- in case of permanent disability.

fields.schemeName: Pension Benefit for the Construction Workers
fields.briefDescription: The "Pension Benefit for the Construction Workers" by the Delhi Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Department, Delhi, is a welfare scheme for the registered workers of the board with a pension benefit of ₹ 3000/- per month after completion of 60 years.

fields.schemeName: Accidental Death Assistance for the Construction Workers
fields.briefDescription: "Accidental Death Assistance for the Construction Workers" by the Delhi Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board, Labour Dept., Delhi, is a welfare scheme that provides financial assistance of ₹2,00,000/- to the nominees/dependents of the members in case the death is due to an accident.

beneficiaryState: The Dadra And Nagar Haveli And Daman And Diu
fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry of Women and Child Development
fields.schemeName: Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme is to provide maternity benefits to women belonging to socially and economically disadvantaged sections of society. For first child the maternity benefit of ₹5,000 is provided in two instalments under PMMVY and second child, it is ₹6,000 is to be provided subject to second child is girl.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance For Education Of Children Of Registered Worker (HBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Financial Assistance for Education of Children of Registered Worker (HBOCWWB)” was launched by the Haryana Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (HBOCWWB), Labour Department Haryana.

fields.schemeName: Banglashree for Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises: State Capital Investment Subsidy (CIS)
fields.briefDescription: “State Capital Investment Subsidy (CIS)” incentives under “Banglashree for MSMEs” scheme implemented by the MSMEs Department, Government of West Bengal, aims to provide Capital Investment Subsidy for its approved project to an eligible micro or small enterprise.

fields.schemeName: Braille Watches by Welfare of Differently Abled Persons Department
fields.briefDescription: The 'Braille Watches by Welfare of Differently Abled Persons Department' scheme was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Government of Tamil Nadu. Under this scheme, braille watches are distributed to working visually impaired persons.

fields.schemeName: Walking Device - Tamil Nadu
fields.briefDescription: The 'Walking Device by Welfare of Differently Abled Persons Department' scheme was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Govt. of Tamil Nadu. The scheme aims to provide a rollator/walker to orthopedically differently abled children having difficulties in walking.

fields.schemeName: Banglashree for Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises: Subsidy for Work Force Welfare Assistance (WWAS)
fields.briefDescription: “Subsidy for Work Force Welfare Assistance (WWAS)” incentives under “Banglashree for MSMEs” scheme implemented by the MSMEs Dept., Government of West Bengal, aims to provide reimbursement of expenditure incurred for paying contribution towards Employees State Insurance (ESI) and Employees Provident.

fields.schemeName: "Outstanding Entrepreneur" under “Motivation of Entrepreneurs to Start Industries and Fiscal Assistance to Industries - State Awards to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises”
fields.briefDescription: "Outstanding Entrepreneur" under “Motivation of Entrepreneurs to Start Industries and Fiscal Assistance to Industries - State Awards to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises” is a scheme by the Industries and Commerce Dept, UT of Puducherry, formulated to award the best entrepreneurs.

fields.schemeName: Banglashree for Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises: Subsidy for State Goods and Services Tax (SGST)
fields.briefDescription: “Subsidy for State Goods and Services Tax (SGST)” incentives under “Banglashree for MSMEs” scheme implemented by the MSMEs Dept., Government of West Bengal, aims to provide refunds for net SGST paid to the Government of West Bengal.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance for Coaching Classes (HBOCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme provides financial assistance of ₹20,000/- for coaching classes for admission of children of registered workers in professional/technical courses and ₹1,00,000/- for preparation of Main Examination on passing Preliminary Examination of UPSC/HPSSC.

fields.schemeName: "Subsidy to Pollution Control Equipment" under "Motivation of Entrepreneurs to Start Industries and Fiscal Assistance to Capital Intensive Industries"
fields.briefDescription: Through "Subsidy to Pollution Control Equipment", the units which are installing pollution control equipment will be granted subsidy @ 25% up to a max. of ₹5,00,000/-. The applications are accepted offline in the prescribed form available on the Official Website of the Department.

fields.schemeName: Early Intervention Centre for the Visually Impaired
fields.briefDescription: The "Early Intervention Centre for the Visually Impaired" was launched by the Department for the Welfare of Differently Abled Persons, Government of Tamil Nadu. Under this scheme, visually impaired children are identified, assessed and prepared to join main stream education in 6 districts.
